name: Dots & Lines: Classic One Touch Draw Puzzle
name_original: Dots & Lines: Classic One Touch Draw Puzzle
description:
Come and play the beautiful, minimalist and completely free puzzle game - Dots & Lines!

Join the adventure and challenge hundreds of levels waiting to be solved!

The rule is simple: tap dots line by line to clear all dots & lines.

• FREE for everyone!
• EXPERIENCE one touch fluid gameplay
• CHALLENGE 100+ fun and beautiful levels
• PLAY to unlock new game mode
• TRAIN your brain and memory
• ENJOY unique shapes

New levels coming soon, stay tuned!

Having any issues or bright ideas? We would be happy to hear from you! Do not hesitate to contact us via this email: help@tapdots.com

PLEASE NOTICE: Dots & Lines is free to play, but includes in app purchases. If you don't want to use this feature just disable it on your device.
